Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class AppServerImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.server.AppServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppServer, Serializable, Remote
public class AppServerImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements AppServer
The AppServerImpl is the implementation of AppServer interface. See AppServer documentation for more information.

    • connect

      public Server connect(AppServer.typeOfMatch type) throws RemoteException, NotSupportedMatchesException
      Creates a new match depending on its type enum, puts it in the "matches" Map and creates a "waiting queue" Map to manage the players' queue
      Specified by:
      connect in interface AppServer
      Parameters:
      type - typeOfMatch enum
      Returns:
      the match's server created
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of a remote method call goes wrong
      NotSupportedMatchesException - if there is an unsupported number of matches

    • heartbeatManagerRMI

      public void heartbeatManagerRMI(String nickname)
      wrapper method that manage the heartbeat for RMI connection. First it resets the client flag to false and the check if the client flag has been set to true (by the remote client heartbeat call)
      Parameters:
      nickname - the identifier of the client
